instruction.en: Welcome to ProFlex4 UI

headline.en: This ATM is fuera de linea.

instruction.en: Please find another cashpoint.
Default instruction text.
You have the following options.
Su petición esta en proceso.
Por favor, inserte su tarjeta.  Bitte führen Sie Ihre Karte ein.

Please use the touch keyboard of the screen to enter your PIN.
Please choose your desired item.
Please select your desired account you want to get the money from.
Please select the cash amount you want to get.
Please select the payee corporation.
Please select your desired EMV application.
Please select one of the options...
Please note.
Please enter your individual amount.

You may change or accept the given denomination.

Change the denomination as you desire. Choose +/-.

headline.en: Please configure your volume and rate
